display_html:
data TableDefinition entity = TableDefinition {
  • tableName :: String
  • tableFields :: [FieldDefinition]
  • tableSafeToDelete :: [String]
  • tableFromSql :: FromSql (entity Record)
  • tableToSql :: forall key. ToSql (entity key) ()
  • tableSetKey :: forall key1 key2. key2 -> entity key1 -> entity key2
  • tableGetKey :: forall key. entity key -> key
  • tableComments :: TableComments ()
}
name: TableDefinition TableDefinition tableName tableFields tableSafeToDelete tableFromSql tableToSql tableSetKey tableGetKey tableComments

display_html:
data TableParams entity = TableParams {
  • tblName :: String

  • tblSetKey :: forall key1 key2. key2 -> entity key1 -> entity key2
  • tblGetKey :: forall key. entity key -> key
  • tblComments :: TableComments ()
}
name: TableParams TableParams tblName tblMapper tblSafeToDelete tblSetKey tblGetKey tblComments
